EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell's Drone Inspection Team Completed Hundreds of Inspections in 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
"Helping you stay on time and on target during critical shutdowns"
Did you know Honeywell's drone inspection team <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/uav]]> completed hundreds of flare inspections globally in 2018?
Through these projects, we've gathered feedback from a variety of customers, suppliers and employees spanning the globe to better understand the environmental impact and maintenance requirements that oil and gas companies need when it comes to their next turnaround.
Partner with a global leader and experienced drone inspection team. For more information or to speak to one of our regional managers, please contact us below.
CONTACT US <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/India_UAV_OilandGas.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_uav_gh]]>
